description:
On fire sale for $0.99!

Studies show that the illusion of security is nearly as effective as security itself. Give your Pre a locked down appearance with Lockitize!

Android lock! Pin code lock! Password lock!

With Lockitize you can select the background you want, then select the lock type you want to appear on that background. Then when your Pre is locked, it will look like you need to access the device using the custom lock!

Send any feedback to clearwaterapps@gmail.com
